interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2020/03/08
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Mark Palansky'], 'Producers': ['Daniel Bekerman', 'Lee Clay'], 'Starring': ['Peter Dinklage', 'Julia Ormond', 'Martin Donovan'], 'Studio': ['tribecashortlist']}
Review Text: This movie was very thought provoking and captivating. Certainly a testament to Peter Dinklages acting is that he is more than Game of Thrones. All in all it makes me wonder what holding onto memories can do and whether or not it is even good to do so at times. A good watch if you're into the type of movies that make you think.
Review Title: Saddening yet englightening
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
